description.en:
GÅngFÅ«ChÃ¡ - å·¥å¤«èŒ¶ currently thrives primarily thanks to the dedication of Yalin and StÃ©phane, who work full-time and (for now) without remuneration. With the help of volunteers, we keep a shop in Massat alive, organize an annual three-day festival that brings together ceramists, artists, and tea enthusiasts, and offer various experiences: tea cultivation, tea hikes, and the collection and analysis of spring water in the Pyrenees. We also provide educational resources and workshops. Our goal by mid-2025 is to fund the first two salaries to establish a sustainable foundation for this adventure and continue sharing the art of GÅngFÅ«ChÃ¡. Your financial support or even just your moral encouragement will help keep this human, artisanal project deeply rooted in nature alive.
